data.text: @chrisdnn101 As I tapped that up I thought ‘I should google that’ but then it was the vibe you know, Marbo

@simon_pound Also, horse a senator is Caligula who was only the third emperor, and it was a consul, and he only thteatened to do it. We should see plenty more at this rate though. Caligula only used the army to pick up shells at the beach and stage mock battles
@simon_pound @ethicalmartini The Romans didn't have nuclear weapons. This is new ground.
